events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer role and will begin reviewing your credentials shortly.
Your application has been categorized under the Engineering department based on your experience with software development and devops.
A recruiter has been assigned to your application and will be your point of contact throughout the hiring process.
Your initial screening interview has been completed successfully with positive feedback on your technical skills and communication.
The technical interview has been scheduled for 2024-04-20 at 10:00 AM UTC to assess your coding and system design abilities.
You have successfully completed the technical interview with impressive problem-solving and coding expertise demonstrated.
Your HR interview has been scheduled for 2024-04-25 at 3:00 PM UTC to discuss culture fit and compensation.
The HR interview went well, with positive signals regarding your alignment to company values and team collaboration.
We have proposed an official job offer which outlines your salary, benefits, and start date details.
You have provided positive feedback regarding the offer and expressed eagerness to join the engineering team.
Congratulations! You have accepted the offer and we are excited to have you onboard as a Software Engineer.
Your onboarding process has started, including orientation sessions and setup of your development environment.
The hiring process is now officially closed with your successful integration into the engineering team.
